modules.description: Handles incoming HTTP connections on a stream socket. Accepts a request handler to process HTTP requests and an error handler for connection errors, operating on stream socket addresses and sockets. Useful for implementing custom HTTP servers with direct control over request handling and error reporting.

This module implements HTTP client functionality over Eio, managing connections and requests with support for streaming sockets. It provides operations to create connections, send requests with custom error and response handlers, and manage connection state through shutdown, closure checks, and protocol upgrades. Concrete use cases include sending HTTP requests over TLS or Unix sockets, handling streaming request bodies, and integrating with Eio-based network services.

Implements HTTP client and server functionality over Eio, handling connection management, request/response processing, and error handling for streaming sockets. Works directly with socket addresses, TLS, and Unix sockets to support custom protocols and network services. Enables building secure, asynchronous HTTP services and clients with fine-grained control over I/O and connection lifecycle.
